data.name: Dear Agony Aunt
data.detailed_description:
Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages from a diverse cast of characters using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!


- wholesome storytelling delivered entirely through emails
- a British magazine that may or may not hire you as their new agony aunt
- a diverse cast of 24 characters, each with their own unique problem to share
- two possible outcomes for every character, determined by the choices you make
- over 15,000 words and over 80 emails to read
- short gameplay, approximately half an hour per playthrough


Dear Agony Aunt is a love letter to the English language.

data.short_description: Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!
data.reviews:
“I was pleasantly surprised by the depth on offer. [...] The game has a nice balance of asking you to concentrate when it matters and then letting you relax when it doesn’t.”
Broken Owly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
